unnormalised: The Ministry of Education has announced the launch of a revamped version of the "PM Poshan Shakti Nirman" scheme, extending its reach to cover pre-school children by the end of FY 2024-25. This expansion aims to improve nutritional outcomes and early childhood education across India. The scheme, previously known as the "National Programme for Mid-Day Meal in Schools," now includes provisions for providing breakfast in addition to lunch in aspirational districts.
